abstract: Regulators will have more time on their hands as the Bush administration rejected more oversight of the rapidly growing hedge fund industry.
snippet: Regulators will have more time on their hands as the Bush administration rejected more oversight of the rapidly growing hedge fund industry.
lead_paragraph: TWO deals punctuated a holiday-shortened week: one, a combination that might run into heavy regulatory scrutiny, the other, less so. In any case, regulators will have a little more time on their hands as the Bush administration and a working group of agencies rejected more oversight of the rapidly growing hedge fund industry.

headline.main: Deals in Radio and Food; Remorse From an Airline
headline.print_headline: Deals in Radio and Food; Remorse From an Airline
